summary: Akkie is a pretty schoolgirl who is good at soccer and doesn't let boys mess with her, until she is diagnosed with leukemia and has to start her battle to stay alive.
cast: Hanna Obbeek|Nils Verkooijen|Fiona Livingston|Bram Flick|Amin Belyandouz|Eva van der Gucht|Loek Peters|Johanna ter Steege|Reinout Bussemaker|Chris Comvalius|Xander Straat|Bram van der Hooven|Lea Vlastra|Renee de Graaff|Lucas Dijker|Mattijn Hartemink|Kaltoum el Fan|Genio de Groot|Fem Petraeus|Wendy van den Top|Lieke van Lexmond|Jacques Vriens|Hanna Verboom|Alex Hendrickx|Manuel Venderbos|Patrick MÃ¶lleken|Adri Doppenberg
title: Achtste-groepers huilen niet
